mapper.sql: ID, LNG, LAT, ADDRESS, FOODCODE, FOODNAME, MERCHANTNAME, MERCHANTCODE, ENTERPRISE, BUSINESSLICENCE, REGISTTYPE, PROVICE, CITY, PHONE, LINKNAME, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, WARECUSTOMERMAN, PROVICECODE, CITYCODE,UPDATECOUNT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT (ID, LNG, LAT, ADDRESS, FOODCODE, FOODNAME, MERCHANTNAME, MERCHANTCODE, ENTERPRISE, BUSINESSLICENCE, REGISTTYPE, PROVICE, CITY, PHONE, LINKNAME, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, WARECUSTOMERMAN, PROVICECODE, CITYCODE) values (SEQ_ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT.Nextval, #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businesslicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdonutc}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedonutc}, #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warecustomerman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
LNG,

ADDRESS,

SEQ_ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT.Nextval,

#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{foodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT
LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOODCODE = #{foodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOODNAME = #{foodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANTNAME = #{merchantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANTCODE = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTERPRISE = #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSLICENCE = #{businesslicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTTYPE = #{registtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVICE = #{provice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKNAME = #{linkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc},
CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARECUSTOMERMAN = #{warecustomerman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVICECODE = #{provicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITYCODE = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATECOUNT = #{updatecount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT set LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODCODE = #{foodcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODNAME = #{foodname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANTNAME = #{merchantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANTCODE = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTERPRISE = #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESSLICENCE = #{businesslicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTTYPE = #{registtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVICE = #{provice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINKNAME = #{linkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc}, CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARECUSTOMERMAN = #{warecustomerman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVICECODE = #{provicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITYCODE = #{citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select * from (select a.*,rownum row_num from (select * from ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT t WHERE 1=1 AND t.REGISTTYPE='1'
and t.MERCHANTNAME like '%' || #{merchantname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
order by t.id desc) a ) b where b.row_num between 1+10*(#{number}-1) and 10+10*(#{number}-1)

select b.MERCHANTNAME,b.MERCHANTCODE,b.LNG,b.LAT from (select CASE WHEN a.MERCHANTNAME IS NOT NULL THEN a.MERCHANTNAME ELSE a.USERNAME||'-个人农机服务商' END MERCHANTNAME, a.MERCHANTCODE,a.LNG,a.LAT, rownum row_num from (SELECT (to_number(#{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-to_number(e.LNG))*(to_number(#{lng,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-to_number(e.LNG))+ (to_number(#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-to_number(e.LAT))*(to_number(#{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})-to_number(e.LAT)) distance, e.USERNAME, e.MERCHANTNAME, e.MERCHANTCODE, e.LNG, e.LAT FROM( SELECT c.MERCHANTNAME, c.MERCHANTCODE, c.LNG, c.LAT, f.USERNAME FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT c LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER d ON c.MERCHANTCODE=d.FARMMACHINEYCODE LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO f ON d.USERCODE=f.USERCODE WHERE c.PROVICECODE=( SELECT b.PROVICECODE FROM ZLNF_COOPUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_COOPINFO b ON a.COOPCODE=b.COOPCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND (d.roletype='2' OR d.ROLETYPE='5') AND c.ISAUDIT='1') e ORDER BY distance ASC) a ) b where b.row_num between 1 and 20

select b.MERCHANTNAME,b.MERCHANTCODE,b.LNG,b.LAT from (select CASE WHEN a.MERCHANTNAME IS NOT NULL THEN a.MERCHANTNAME ELSE a.USERNAME||'-个人农机服务商' END MERCHANTNAME, a.MERCHANTCODE,a.LNG,a.LAT,rownum row_num from (SELECT (to_number(e.USERLNG)-to_number(e.LNG))*(to_number(e.USERLNG)-to_number(e.LNG))+ (to_number(e.USERLAT)-to_number(e.LAT))*(to_number(e.USERLAT)-to_number(e.LAT)) distance, e.USERNAME, e.MERCHANTNAME, e.MERCHANTCODE, e.LNG, e.LAT FROM(SELECT c.MERCHANTNAME, c.MERCHANTCODE, c.LNG, c.LAT, f.USERNAME, (SELECT b.LNG FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT b ON a.FARMMACHINEYCODE=b.MERCHANTCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) userlng, (SELECT b.LAT FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT b ON a.FARMMACHINEYCODE=b.MERCHANTCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) userlat FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT c LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER d ON c.MERCHANTCODE=d.FARMMACHINEYCODE LEFT JOIN ZLNF_FCUSTOMERINFO f ON d.USERCODE=f.USERCODE WHERE c.PROVICECODE=( SELECT b.PROVICECODE FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT b ON a.FARMMACHINEYCODE=b.MERCHANTCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND c.ID != ( SELECT b.ID FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT b ON a.FARMMACHINEYCODE=b.MERCHANTCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND (d.roletype='2' OR d.ROLETYPE='5') AND c.ISAUDIT='1' ) e ORDER BY distance ASC) a ) b where b.row_num between 1 and 10
